descriptions.description:
We are pleased that you can join us to celebrate our wedding celebration this September 5th in Tahoe, California.

[Add to Calendar](https://hippo-public-assets.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/assets/che-marzejon-wedding.ics)

**Need a place to stay?**

Consider staying at the Village at Squaw Valley where we will be staying ourselves. We have negotiated special rates for our guests, to book online, please use this [room block reservation link](https://book.squawalpine.com/Ecomm/Package/Package/9801138/en-US/?packageid=56589&promocode=CheMarzejon). 

Alternatively, you may call the Resort’s Reservations Department at [866-818-6963](tel:866-818-6963).

**Worried about Covid? We are too.**

We absolutely want everyone to stay healthy and celebrate together, as we get closer to September, we will let everyone know of any potential restrictions or precautions required. Take a look at our [Covid page](/covid) and check back regularly.

Cieszymy się, że możesz dołączyć do nas, aby świętować nasze wesele 5 września w Kalifornii.

Alternatively, you may call the Resort’s Reservations Department at [866-818-6963](tel:866-818-6963).

**Worried about Covid? We are too.**

We absolutely want everyone to stay healthy and celebrate together, as we get closer to September, we will let everyone know of any potential restrictions or precautions required. Take a look at our [Covid page](/covid) and check back regularly.
